title: lol 20 min penalty
body:
HI Im a lol beginner and i got a 20 min ban from getting out in the middle of the game. 
I play in internet cafe and i play for 3 hours everyday, whenever i start a game when my computer has 45 min left in the cafe, and the game goes for 40 min so when ever i try to finish the game the computer turns off and i get 20 min penalty everytime so can someone help me how to delete the penalty.

replies.body:
Don't start games if you don't have at least an hour of internet time. Ultimately, if you are leaving games you will be faced with those 20 minute timers. So long as you continue to leave games (regardless of the reason), you will continue to get those timers. 

If you choose to play a game when you may not be able to commit the whole amount of time it may take, then you have to accept the consequences of that, just as the players in your game have to accept the frustration of losing a player.

How to delete penalty a Step by Step process

- Don't get them to start with (You need minimum 1hr of internet time to play a game, even if it only goes for 30 mins)
- Once you have 20 mins penalty - Wait 20 mins
- Profit :^)
